body.name: 16 Pcs Lab Coat for Kids Scientist Lab Coat Costume Kit with Glasses ID Card for Science Projects and Experiments Costume
features: Package Includes: you will get 4 pieces of white coat, 4 pieces of goggles, 4 pieces of ID card holders and 4 pieces of magnifier, a total of 16 pieces, which are enough to meet your role playing needs

Versatile Costume: this playset can be applied as a costume for scientists, doctors, veterinarians, laboratory technicians, dentists, chemists, and more; This can stimulate your children to explore science and cultivate their self study ability

Safe and Reliable Materials: scientist lab coat is made of quality, breathable and sturdy polyester materials; Scientific goggles provide eye protection; ID card is made of ABS plastic, which can be applied as name tag to make children' dress more professional

Size Information: the doctor scientist lab costume has different size for you to choose from, you can choose the right size according to your size information; Please refer to the picture for detailed size

Wide Applications: children's scientist lab coat costume kit is suitable for lab theme party, scientist role play, doctor role play, birthday, Halloween, Christmas role play, carnival, Easter, cosplay, school performance, dance concert, stage, school performance, photo props, activities, and daily fun
body.description: Features: The lab coat for kids is an ideal accessory for kids to cosplay, finish school projects, do lab experiments and more, by taking on the role of different professions and characters to enrich their skills and experience. The kids lab coat scientist can dress you up as a scientist, engineer, paleontologist, doctor or even famous figure. Specifications: Material: Coat: polyesterID card: ABS plasticColor: as pictures shownSize: as pictures shownPackage includes: 4 x White coat4 x Goggles4 x ID card holders4 x MagnifierNotes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Science party favours
reviews.reviewText: Bought them for a 6yr old science party and gave them to each guest. Everyone loved them and looked super cute in their lab coats.
